body:
Hey, I recently made a sword pack and I thought I'd share it with you guys <3

NOTE this is NOT  a resource pack, this is a sword pack which means you put the swords into whatever resource pack you want. :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qhmQgHvuIDA&feature=gp-n-y&google_comment_id=z12ustazon24izxlu23zvpf...
Download Link in description of video
If I get 20 likes ill be releasing the tools, bow, lighter & rod! :D Enjoy <3

title: KingdomCraft Sword Pack Made By Me! +Download

replies.body:
Holy crap, those are some sick swords. I love the little material in the base of the blade that tells you what the sword was made of. You made these yourself, right? You deserve a lot more views!

I'd love to see more textures from you. Liked and subscribed C:
replies.body_tagged:
Holy crap, those are some sick swords. I love the little material in the base of the blade that tells you what the sword was made of. You made these yourself, right? You deserve a lot more views!

I'd love to see more textures from you. Liked and subscribed C:

replies.body: Thankyou so much! :D And yeah I made them, every single pixel. ;D
replies.body_tagged: Thankyou so much! :D And yeah I made them, every single pixel. ;D

replies.body: I dont really like the swords, i mean they are really good, but i just like swords that are cut off like this:
replies.body_tagged: I dont really like the swords, i mean they are really good, but i just like swords that are cut off like this:

replies.body: Personally, it doesn't faze me. I'm not really much a PvP kinda person I'm more of a creator. But everyone has their own styles and opinions of what they like. This is definetly not my last sword pack so maybe in my next one ill make one a little like that?

replies.body: Yeah, but what I'm saying is that I honestly love all types of swords. Your style is like pointy swords, and my style is creating all different styles. I'm obviously going to make swords a lot different to this, so maybe check them out when I make more. I don't really have a style of sword I like, as long as they aren't really short haha

replies.body: lol xD, but just make them how you feel you want to make them :)
replies.body_tagged: lol xD, but just make them how you feel you want to make them :)

replies.body: Could I ask what revolution the swords are?
replies.body_tagged: Could I ask what revolution the swords are?

replies.body:
I don't really know what you mean by revolution, I'm going to assume you mean resolution and the answer to that is they are 512x512 to ensure they have a really clean, smooth look.

Don't worry if your not using a resource pack that big, it will still work fine :)
